name: Windows Defender Threat Detected
description: Detects all actions taken by Windows Defender malware detection engines
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational AND event.code:(1006 OR 1116 OR 1015 OR 1117))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational AND event.code:(1006 OR 1116 OR 1015 OR 1117))`
